faq.question: How do I enroll in a course?
faq.answer: You can browse the courses, select the one you want, and click on "Enroll Now". You’ll then be guided through the registration and payment process.

faq.question: Do you provide certification after completion?
faq.answer: Yes, all courses provide a certificate of completion. Professional certification courses like PMP and Scrum also provide globally recognized certificates.

faq.question: Are the courses self-paced or instructor-led?
faq.answer: We provide both options depending on the course. You can check the course details to see if it’s self-paced, live online, or classroom training.

faq.question: Can I access the course on mobile?
faq.answer: Yes, our courses are accessible on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, allowing you to learn anytime, anywhere.

faq.question: Is there any refund policy?
faq.answer: Yes, refunds are available within 7 days of enrollment.
